translated: It is the dispeller of all misfortune, because it is the nature of the abandonment of all faults.

original: ngan song gi sgo thams cad gcod pa'o zhes pa ni dmyal ba dang / yi dags dag /
analyzed: ngan song gi sgo thams cad gcod pa'o zhes pa ni dmyal ba dang / yi dags dag /
translated: It closes all the doors to the unfortunate realms.

original: byol song gi bdag nyid kyi ngan song gi sgo rnams gcod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byol song gi bdag nyid kyi ngan song gi sgo rnams gcod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It closes the doors to the unfortunate realms of the hells, hungry ghosts, and animals.🔽It is the good path to the city of liberation.

original: rnam par grol ba'i grong khyer gyi lam bzang po'o zhes pa ni lam rnams kyang de yin la bzang po yang de nyid yin pas lam bzang po'o //
analyzed: rnam par grol ba'i grong khyer gyi lam bzang po'o zhes pa ni lam rnams kyang de yin la bzang po yang de nyid yin pas lam bzang po'o //
translated: It is the good path because it is the path and it is good.

original: 'khor ba'i 'khor lor mi 'jug pa'o zhes pa ni rab tu 'jug pa ni 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i 'khor lor mi 'jug pa'o zhes pa ni rab tu 'jug pa ni 'jug pa'o //
translated: It does not enter the wheel of life.

original: 'jug pa med pa ni mi 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: 'jug pa med pa ni mi 'jug pa'o //
translated: It does not enter because it does not enter.🔽It turns the wheel of the Dharma.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o zhes pa ni skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o zhes pa ni skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It turns the wheel of the Dharma in accordance with the good fortune of beings.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng ba'o zhes pa ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng ba'o zhes pa ni /
translated: It raises the parasol, banner, and flag of the teachings of the Tathagata.

original: phyi rol ba dang nyan thos la sogs pa rnams kyi bsod nams zil gyis gnon pa'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba ni mtshan yang dag par brjod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: phyi rol ba dang nyan thos la sogs pa rnams kyi bsod nams zil gyis gnon pa'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba ni mtshan yang dag par brjod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The raising of parasols, banners, and flags that surpass the merit of non-Buddhists, śrāvakas, and so on is because of the Perfect Praise itself.

original: chos thams cad bstan pa'i gnas so zhes pa ni gnas ni bstan par byed pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad bstan pa'i gnas so zhes pa ni gnas ni bstan par byed pa'o //
translated: The place of teaching all dharmas is the place of teaching.

original: byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyi myur du 'grub pa'o zhes pa la /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyi myur du 'grub pa'o zhes pa la /
translated: The swift accomplishment of bodhisattvas practicing the conduct of the gateway of secret mantra is as follows.

original: de la myur du 'grub pa ni yang @108b spyod pa la mi ltos pa nyid kyis myur du 'grub pa'o //
analyzed: de la myur du 'grub pa ni yang @108b spyod pa la mi ltos pa nyid kyis myur du 'grub pa'o //
translated: There, swift accomplishment is the swift accomplishment that does not depend on conduct again.

original: byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams kyi sgom pa rtogs pa'o zhes pa la /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams kyi sgom pa rtogs pa'o zhes pa la /
translated: The realization of the meditation of bodhisattvas striving in the perfection of wisdom is as follows.

original: bsgom pa ni yang dang yang du goms pa'o //
analyzed: bsgom pa ni yang dang yang du goms pa'o //
translated: Meditation is familiarization again and again.

original: rtogs pa ni mngon du byed pa'o //
analyzed: rtogs pa ni mngon du byed pa'o //
translated: Realization is making manifest.

original: gnyis su med par so sor rtogs pa bsgom pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid so sor rtogs pa ni yang dang yang du 'bigs pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis su med par so sor rtogs pa bsgom pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid so sor rtogs pa ni yang dang yang du 'bigs pa'o //
translated: The repeated penetration of emptiness by those who are intent on the cultivation of the realization of non-duality is the realization of emptiness.

original: stong ba nyid la sor sor rtogs pa ni stong ba nyid la so sor rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: stong ba nyid la sor sor rtogs pa ni stong ba nyid la so sor rtogs pa'o //
translated: The realization of emptiness is the realization of emptiness.🔽The definite accomplishment of all the perfections and accumulations is the definite accomplishment.🔽The complete perfection of all the stages is the complete perfection.🔽The complete purity of all the stages is the complete purity.🔽The complete purity of all the stages is the complete purity.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa dang tshogs thams cad nges par 'grub pa'o zhes pa la nges par 'gyur ba ni phun sum tshogs pa rdzogs pa'o ;
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa dang tshogs thams cad nges par 'grub pa'o zhes pa la nges par 'gyur ba ni phun sum tshogs pa rdzogs pa'o ;
translated: The complete purity of all the stages is the complete purity.

original: / sa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes pa ni /
analyzed: / sa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes pa ni /
translated: The complete purity of all the stages is the complete purity.

original: kun du yongs su dag pa'i yongs su dag pa'o //🔽'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po yang dag pa'o zhes pa ni grub pa'i rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: kun du yongs su dag pa'i yongs su dag pa'o // 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po yang dag pa'o zhes pa ni grub pa'i rtogs pa'o //
translated: The complete purity of all the stages is the complete purity.🔽The complete purity of all the stages is the complete purity.🔽The complete purity of all the stages is the complete purity.🔽The complete purity of all the stages is the complete purity.🔽The complete purity of all the stages is the complete purity.🔽The complete purity of all the stages is the complete purity.🔽The complete purity of all the stages is the complete purity.🔽The complete purity of all the stages is the complete purity.🔽The complete purity of all the stages is the complete purity.🔽The complete purity of all the stages is the complete purity.🔽The complete purity of all the stages is the complete purity.🔽The complete purity of all the stages is the complete purity.🔽The complete purity of all the stages is the complete purity.🔽The complete purity of all the stages is the complete purity.🔽The complete purity of all the stages is the complete purity.🔽The complete purity of all the stages is the complete purity.🔽The complete purity of all the stages is the complete purity.🔽The complete purity of all the stages is the complete purity.🔽The complete purity of all the stages is the complete purity.🔽The complete purity of all the stages is the complete purity.🔽The complete purity of all the stages is the complete purity.🔽The complete purity of all the stages is the complete purity.🔽The complete purity of all the stages is the complete purity.🔽The complete purity of all the stages is the complete purity.🔽The complete purity of all the stages is the complete purity.🔽The complete purity of all the stages is the complete purity.🔽The complete purity of all the stages is the complete purity.🔽The complete purity of all the stages is the complete purity.🔽The complete purity of all the stages is the complete purity.

original: chos thams cad kyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po rnams kyi chos thams cad sems rtse gcig gis rtogs pa'o zhes pa ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po rnams kyi chos thams cad sems rtse gcig gis rtogs pa'o zhes pa ni /
translated: The complete purity of all the stages is the complete purity.🔽The complete

original: de la chos thams cad ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'o //
analyzed: de la chos thams cad ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'o //
translated: In this regard, all phenomena are the five appropriated aggregates.

original: de rnams la sems rtse gcig gi dmigs pa nyid kyis de rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams la sems rtse gcig gi dmigs pa nyid kyis de rtogs pa'o //
translated: They are realized by means of the single-pointed mind that is the object of observation.

original: de'i don ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: de'i don ni bshad zin to //
translated: The meaning of that has been explained.

original: mtshan yang dag phar brjod pa 'di ni sangs rgyas byi yon tan thams cad kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o zhes pa'i bar du'o //
analyzed: mtshan yang dag phar brjod pa 'di ni sangs rgyas byi yon tan thams cad kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o zhes pa'i bar du'o //
translated: This expression of the true nature of the characteristics is the perfection of all the qualities of the Buddha.

original: rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i 'khor lo gnyis pa'i yon tan te tshig rkang lnga bcu rtsa gnyis so //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i 'khor lo gnyis pa'i yon tan te tshig rkang lnga bcu rtsa gnyis so //
translated: These are the qualities of the second wheel of Great Vairocana. There are fifty-two lines.

original: de nas da ni 'khor lo gsum pa'i yon tan gyi dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nas da ni 'khor lo gsum pa'i yon tan gyi dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
translated: Now, from the perspective of the qualities of the third wheel, it is said:

original: lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang gzhan yang mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi lus dang ngag dang yid la kun du spyod pa'i sdig pa ma lus par rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o zhes pa ni ma lus mi lus pa'i
analyzed: lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang gzhan yang mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi lus dang ngag dang yid la kun du spyod pa'i sdig pa ma lus par rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o zhes pa ni ma lus mi lus pa'i
translated: Vajrapāṇi, Vajradhara, moreover, this expression of the true nature of the characteristics is the complete pacification of all the sins of body, speech, and mind of all sentient beings without exception.

original: lus ngag yid gsum gyi spyod pa ste /
analyzed: lus ngag yid gsum gyi spyod pa ste /
translated: The conduct of body, speech, and mind.

original: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi sdig pa gang yin pa zhi bar byed pa'o //🔽sems can thams cad kyi ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyong ba'o //
analyzed: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi sdig pa gang yin pa zhi bar byed pa'o // sems can thams cad kyi ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyong ba'o //
translated: It pacifies the evil deeds of body, speech, and mind.🔽It purifies all the evil destinies of all sentient beings.

original: ngan 'gro thams cad bzlog pa'o zhes pa ni ngan 'gro thams cad las te gsum las bzlog pa ni ngan 'gro thams cad las bzlog pa'o //
analyzed: ngan 'gro thams cad bzlog pa'o zhes pa ni ngan 'gro thams cad las te gsum las bzlog pa ni ngan 'gro thams cad las bzlog pa'o //
translated: It turns away from all evil destinies.

original: las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yang dag par gcod pa'o zhes pa ni las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yang dag par gcod pa'i @109a * //
analyzed: las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yang dag par gcod pa'o zhes pa ni las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yang dag par gcod pa'i @109a * //
translated: It completely severs all karmic obscurations.

original: phyir ro // mi khom pa brgyad po thams cad kyi skye ba'i rgyun mi skye bar byed pa'o zhes pa ni /
analyzed: phyir ro // mi khom pa brgyad po thams cad kyi skye ba'i rgyun mi skye bar byed pa'o zhes pa ni /
translated: It prevents the arising of the causes for birth in all eight of the inopportune states.

original: de la mi khom pa thams cad ni /
analyzed: de la mi khom pa thams cad ni /
translated: All inopportune states

original: khom pa dang go skabs yod pa dang long yod pa zhes pa ni don gyi rnam grangs te /
analyzed: khom pa dang go skabs yod pa dang long yod pa zhes pa ni don gyi rnam grangs te /
translated: are opportunities, chances, and openings.

original: mngon par rtogs pa'i sgrub pa'i go skabs med pa'i phyir na mi khom pa zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: mngon par rtogs pa'i sgrub pa'i go skabs med pa'i phyir na mi khom pa zhes gsungs so //
translated: Because there is no opportunity for the realization of the practice, they are called “unfree states.”

original: de yang brgyad de /
analyzed: de yang brgyad de /
translated: There are eight of them:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: dmyal bar skye ba dang / byol song du skye ba dang / yi dags su skye ba dang / mtha' 'khob tu skye ba dang / gzugs med pa dang 'du shes med pa'i srid par skye ba dang / long ba dang 'on pa dang glen pa la sogs pa skye bar 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: dmyal bar skye ba dang / byol song du skye ba dang / yi dags su skye ba dang / mtha' 'khob tu skye ba dang / gzugs med pa dang 'du shes med pa'i srid par skye ba dang / long ba dang 'on pa dang glen pa la sogs pa skye bar 'gyur ba dang /
translated: Birth in the hells, birth as an animal, birth as a hungry ghost, birth in a remote place, birth in the formless realm or the realm of no-thought, birth as a deaf, blind, or mute person,

original: lta ba log pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas med pa'i skal ba la skyes pa rnams so //
analyzed: lta ba log pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas med pa'i skal ba la skyes pa rnams so //
translated: birth in a place where there is no buddha, and birth in a place where there is no opportunity to practice.

original: 'jig pa chen po brgyad rnam par zhi bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig pa chen po brgyad rnam par zhi bar byed pa'o //
translated: It pacifies the eight great fears.

original: rmi lam ngan pa thams cad sel bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: rmi lam ngan pa thams cad sel bar byed pa'o //
translated: It removes all bad dreams.

original: lta ba ngan pa thams cad sel bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: lta ba ngan pa thams cad sel bar byed pa'o //
translated: It removes all bad views.

original: sdang ba dang dgra bgegs thams cad zhi bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: sdang ba dang dgra bgegs thams cad zhi bar byed pa'o //
translated: It pacifies all enemies, hindrances, and ill will.

original: bdud kyi dgra'i las thams cad ring du sbong bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: bdud kyi dgra'i las thams cad ring du sbong bar byed pa'o //
translated: It keeps all the works of the demon-enemies far away.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bsod rnams thams cad 'phang bar byed pa'o zhes pa rnams kyi don go bar zad do //
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bsod rnams thams cad 'phang bar byed pa'o zhes pa rnams kyi don go bar zad do //
translated: It is the one that increases all the roots of virtue and merits.🔽The meaning of these is self-evident.🔽It is the one that prevents all improper mental activity from arising.

original: tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa thams cad mi skye bar byed pa'o zhes pa ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs su gyur ba rnams med par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa thams cad mi skye bar byed pa'o zhes pa ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs su gyur ba rnams med par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Improper mental activity is that which becomes an adversary of meditative concentration.

original: rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang / nga rgyal dang / nga yir 'dzin pa thams cad ma lus par 'joms par byed pa'o zhes pa ni /
analyzed: rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang / nga rgyal dang / nga yir 'dzin pa thams cad ma lus par 'joms par byed pa'o zhes pa ni /
translated: It is the one that completely destroys all intoxication, arrogance, pride, and possessiveness.

original: de la rgyags pa ni rang gi phun sum tshogs pa la chags pa dang dga' ba'i sems kyi zhen pa'o //
analyzed: de la rgyags pa ni rang gi phun sum tshogs pa la chags pa dang dga' ba'i sems kyi zhen pa'o //
translated: Therein, intoxication is the mind's attachment and delight in one's own excellence.

original: dregs pa ni bdag tu 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: dregs pa ni bdag tu 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Arrogance is the grasping of self.

original: nga rgyal ni khengs pa'o //
analyzed: nga rgyal ni khengs pa'o //
translated: Pride is the swelling up of the mind.

original: nga yir 'dzin pa ni bdag gir 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: nga yir 'dzin pa ni bdag gir 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Possessiveness is the grasping of what is not self as self.

original: de rnams ma lus par 'joms par byed pa de la de ltar gsungs so //
analyzed: de rnams ma lus par 'joms par byed pa de la de ltar gsungs so //
translated: That which completely destroys these is so called.

original: sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba thams cad mi skye bar byed pa'o zhes pa ni /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba thams cad mi skye bar byed pa'o zhes pa ni /
translated: It causes the non-arising of all suffering and mental unhappiness.

original: de la lus dang yid las skyes pa'i sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba thams cad mi skye bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la lus dang yid las skyes pa'i sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba thams cad mi skye bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Here, it causes the non-arising of all suffering and mental unhappiness born of body and mind.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying por gyur ba'o zhes pa ni 'di las skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying por gyur ba'o zhes pa ni 'di las skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the essence of all the Tathagatas, because it is born from this.

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gsang bar 'gyur ba ni sba bar bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gsang bar 'gyur ba ni sba bar bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is the secret of all the Bodhisattvas, because it is to be kept secret.

original: nyan thos @109b dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang chen du gyur ba ni rab tu ma bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyan thos @109b dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang chen du gyur ba ni rab tu ma bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is the great secret of all the Sravakas and Pratyekabuddhas, because it is not taught to them.

original: phyag rgya dang gsang sngags thams cad do zhes pa ni phyag rgya thams cad ni phyag rgya bzhi'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya dang gsang sngags thams cad do zhes pa ni phyag rgya thams cad ni phyag rgya bzhi'o //
translated: It is all the seals and all the mantras. All the seals are the four seals.

original: gsang sngags thams cad ni snying po la sogs pa rnams te /
analyzed: gsang sngags thams cad ni snying po la sogs pa rnams te /
translated: All the mantras are the essence mantras, etc.,

original: de'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are of its nature.

original: chos thams cad brjod du med pa'i smra ba rnams kyi dran pa dang shes bzhin yang dag par bskyed pa'o zhes pa ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad brjod du med pa'i smra ba rnams kyi dran pa dang shes bzhin yang dag par bskyed pa'o zhes pa ni /
translated: The correct generation of mindfulness and vigilance of all phenomena, which are inexpressible, is the speech of the bodhisattvas.

original: chos thams cad ni phung po la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: chos thams cad ni phung po la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: All phenomena are the aggregates and so forth.

original: de rnams kyi brjod pa ni brjod par bya ba ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: de rnams kyi brjod pa ni brjod par bya ba ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: Their inexpressibility is their being inexpressible.

original: de smra ba'i tshul dang gang ldan pa de de ltar gsungs so //
analyzed: de smra ba'i tshul dang gang ldan pa de de ltar gsungs so //
translated: He who has that kind of speech is said to be that way.

original: de bas na de rnams kyi dran pa ni 'dris ba'i dngos po la sems kyis mi brjod par sems kyis mngon par brjod pa nyid do //
analyzed: de bas na de rnams kyi dran pa ni 'dris ba'i dngos po la sems kyis mi brjod par sems kyis mngon par brjod pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, their mindfulness is the mental non-utterance of the object of acquaintance.

original: shes bzhin ni lus ngag gi rang dbang du gnas pa ste /
analyzed: shes bzhin ni lus ngag gi rang dbang du gnas pa ste /
translated: Vigilance is the mental control of body and speech.

original: de gnyis yang dag par bskyed par bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de gnyis yang dag par bskyed par bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is the correct generation of those two.🔽The generation of unsurpassed wisdom and the sharpening of the intellect is the speech of the bodhisattvas.

original: bla na med pa'i shes rab bskyed pa dang yid gzhungs par byed pa'o zhes pa ni shes rab dang yid gzhungs par byed pa gnyis ni shes rab dang yid gzhungs pa'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i shes rab bskyed pa dang yid gzhungs par byed pa'o zhes pa ni shes rab dang yid gzhungs par byed pa gnyis ni shes rab dang yid gzhungs pa'o //
translated: The sharpening of the intellect is the sharpening of the intellect.

original: ba na med pa'i shes rab dang yid gzhungs par byed pa'i tshul dang gang ldan pa de la de ltar ro //
analyzed: ba na med pa'i shes rab dang yid gzhungs par byed pa'i tshul dang gang ldan pa de la de ltar ro //
translated: He who has the method of producing the wisdom and the intelligence that is not absent is so called.

original: nad med pa dang / stobs dang / dbang phyug phun sum tshogs par byed pa'o zhes pa ni /
analyzed: nad med pa dang / stobs dang / dbang phyug phun sum tshogs par byed pa'o zhes pa ni /
translated: He who produces the perfection of health, strength, and sovereignty is so called.

original: de la nad med par byed pa ni nad med pa nyid do //
analyzed: de la nad med par byed pa ni nad med pa nyid do //
translated: Therein, the producer of health is health itself.

original: stobs ni lus kyi nus pa'o //
analyzed: stobs ni lus kyi nus pa'o //
translated: Strength is the capacity of the body.

original: dbang phyug ni glang po che dang rta la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dbang phyug ni glang po che dang rta la sogs pa'o //
translated: Sovereignty is the elephant, the horse, and so on.

original: phun sum tshogs pa ni nor dang 'brul la sogs pa //
analyzed: phun sum tshogs pa ni nor dang 'brul la sogs pa //
translated: Perfection is wealth, grain, and so on.

original: de kun bya ba'i tshul dang gang ldan pa de la de ltar gsungs so //
analyzed: de kun bya ba'i tshul dang gang ldan pa de la de ltar gsungs so //
translated: He who has the method of producing all that is so called.

original: dpal dang / dga' ba dang / zhi ba dang / legs par rab tu 'phel bar byed pa'o zhes pa ni /
analyzed: dpal dang / dga' ba dang / zhi ba dang / legs par rab tu 'phel bar byed pa'o zhes pa ni /
translated: He who produces glory, joy, peace, and auspiciousness is so called.

original: de la dpal ni g-yang ngo //
analyzed: de la dpal ni g-yang ngo //
translated: Therein, glory is prosperity.

original: dge ba ni bzang po'o //
analyzed: dge ba ni bzang po'o //
translated: Joy is good.

original: zhi ba ni bde legs so //
analyzed: zhi ba ni bde legs so //
translated: Peace is well-being.

original: legs pa ni bkra shis te de rnams rab tu 'phel bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: legs pa ni bkra shis te de rnams rab tu 'phel bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Auspiciousness is good fortune, because they are the producers of those.

original: grags pa dang / snyan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / bstod pa grags par byed pa'o zhes pa ni /
analyzed: grags pa dang / snyan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / bstod pa grags par byed pa'o zhes pa ni /
translated: eulogy, and renown.

original: de la snyan pa ni chos kyi sbyin pa'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: de la snyan pa ni chos kyi sbyin pa'i sgo nas so //
translated: Here, praise is through the gift of Dharma.

original: grags pa ni zang zing gi sbyin pa'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: grags pa ni zang zing gi sbyin pa'i sgo nas so //
translated: Fame is through the gift of material things.

original: tshigs su bcad pa ni mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pas so //
analyzed: tshigs su bcad pa ni mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pas so //
translated: Eulogy is through the gift of fearlessness.

original: bstod pa ni dbang bskur ba'i sbyin pas so //
analyzed: bstod pa ni dbang bskur ba'i sbyin pas so //
translated: Renown is through the gift of consecration.

original: de yang de rnams kyi sbyin pa bzhi po 'di rnams rab tu ston par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang de rnams kyi sbyin pa bzhi po 'di rnams rab tu ston par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And that is because they demonstrate these four gifts.

original: nad dang 'jigs pa chen po thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o zhes @110a * //
analyzed: nad dang 'jigs pa chen po thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o zhes @110a * //
translated: It completely pacifies all illnesses and great fears.

original: pa ni nad thams cad kho na 'jigs pa chen po rnams yin pas nad nyid 'jigs pa chen po'o //
analyzed: pa ni nad thams cad kho na 'jigs pa chen po rnams yin pas nad nyid 'jigs pa chen po'o //
translated: Since all illnesses are great fears, illness itself is a great fear.

original: de rnams rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o //
translated: It completely pacifies them.

original: shin tu rnam par dag pa rnams kyi yang shin tu rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par dag pa rnams kyi yang shin tu rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: It is the complete pacification of those who are completely purified.

original: shin tu dag par byed pa rnams kyi yang shin tu dag par byed pa'o zhes pa ni ;
analyzed: shin tu dag par byed pa rnams kyi yang shin tu dag par byed pa'o zhes pa ni ;
translated: It is the purifier of those who are very pure.

original: ha ri ni rkyen gyi sgo nas so //
analyzed: ha ri ni rkyen gyi sgo nas so //
translated: This is the nature of the condition of hari.

original: rab tu byang ba rnams kyi yang rab tu byang ba'o //
analyzed: rab tu byang ba rnams kyi yang rab tu byang ba'o //
translated: It is the perfection of those who are perfect.🔽It is the auspiciousness of all that is auspicious.

original: rab tu bkra shis pa thams cad kyi yang rab tu bkra shis pa'o zhes pa ni ta ma'i rkyen gyi rang bzhin bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: rab tu bkra shis pa thams cad kyi yang rab tu bkra shis pa'o zhes pa ni ta ma'i rkyen gyi rang bzhin bstan pa yin no //
translated: This is the teaching on the nature of the condition of tama.

original: skyabs 'dod pa rnams kyi yang skyabs so zhes pa ni skyabs nyid do //
analyzed: skyabs 'dod pa rnams kyi yang skyabs so zhes pa ni skyabs nyid do //
translated: It is the refuge of those who desire refuge.🔽This is the nature of refuge.🔽It is the abode of those who have no abode.

original: gnas med pa rnams kyi gnas so zhes pa ni cher gnas pa nyid do //
analyzed: gnas med pa rnams kyi gnas so zhes pa ni cher gnas pa nyid do //
translated: This is the nature of great abode.

original: skyob pa 'dod pa rnams kyi yang rab tu bya zhes pa ni srung ba nyid do //
analyzed: skyob pa 'dod pa rnams kyi yang rab tu bya zhes pa ni srung ba nyid do //
translated: It is the protection of those who desire protection.🔽This is the nature of guarding.🔽It is the ally of those who desire an ally.

original: dpung gnyen 'dod pa rnams kyi yang dpung gnyen no zhes pa ni gzhan don nyid do //
analyzed: dpung gnyen 'dod pa rnams kyi yang dpung gnyen no zhes pa ni gzhan don nyid do //
translated: This is the nature of benefiting others.

original: gling 'dod pa rnams kyi gling ngo zhes pa ni /
analyzed: gling 'dod pa rnams kyi gling ngo zhes pa ni /
translated: It is the continent of those who desire a continent.

original: de las chus bskor ba ni gling ngo //
analyzed: de las chus bskor ba ni gling ngo //
translated: That which is surrounded by water is a continent.

original: gling 'dod pa rnams la de ltar gyur pa nyid do //
analyzed: gling 'dod pa rnams la de ltar gyur pa nyid do //
translated: For those who desire a continent, it is just that.

original: 'khras 'dod pa rnams kyi 'khras bla na med pa'o zhes pa ni bla na med pa'i 'khras nyid kyi phyir ro /
analyzed: 'khras 'dod pa rnams kyi 'khras bla na med pa'o zhes pa ni bla na med pa'i 'khras nyid kyi phyir ro /
translated: It is the unsurpassed refuge for those who desire refuge, because it is the unsurpassed refuge.

original: srid ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu 'gro ba rnams kyi gru'o zhes pa ni chos kyi pha rol tu 'gro ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //🔽nang thams cad sel ba'i sman gyi rgyal po'o zhes pa ni don go bar zang do ;🔽/ blang ba dang / dor ba'i dngos po bye brag phyed pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa ni blang ba dang dor ba ni go bar byed pa rnams kyi rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: srid ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu 'gro ba rnams kyi gru'o zhes pa ni chos kyi pha rol tu 'gro ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro // nang thams cad sel ba'i sman gyi rgyal po'o zhes pa ni don go bar zang do ; / blang ba dang / dor ba'i dngos po bye brag phyed pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa ni blang ba dang dor ba ni go bar byed pa rnams kyi rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is the boat for those who are crossing over to the other shore of the ocean of existence, because it is the nature of the crossing over to the other shore of the Dharma.🔽It is the king of medicines for the removal of all internal and external evils, because it is the cause for the discrimination of the things to be adopted and to be avoided.🔽It is the light of knowledge which removes the darkness of all bad views, because it is the cause for the discrimination of the things to be adopted and to be avoided.

original: lta ba ngan pa'i mun nag thams cad sel ba'i ye shes kyi snang ba'o zhes pa ni de'i phyir na de de ltar gsungs so //
analyzed: lta ba ngan pa'i mun nag thams cad sel ba'i ye shes kyi snang ba'o zhes pa ni de'i phyir na de de ltar gsungs so //
translated: It is the light of knowledge which removes the darkness of all bad views, because it is the cause for the discrimination of the things to be adopted and to be avoided.

original: sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi bsams pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bu'o zhes pa ni sems can thams cad kyi yid la 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi bsams pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bu'o zhes pa ni sems can thams cad kyi yid la 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is like a wish-fulfilling gem, fulfilling the wishes of all sentient beings, according to their thoughts.

original: 'jam dpal ye shes kyi ska thob par bya ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so zhes pa ni ye shes dang mtshungs par ldan pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
analyzed: 'jam dpal ye shes kyi ska thob par bya ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so zhes pa ni ye shes dang mtshungs par ldan pa nyid kyi phyir ro /
translated: It is the wisdom of omniscience, for the sake of attaining the wisdom of Mañjuśrī.

original: spyan lnga thob par bya ba'i phyir ye shes mthong ba yongs su thob pa'o zhes pa ni /
analyzed: spyan lnga thob par bya ba'i phyir ye shes mthong ba yongs su thob pa'o zhes pa ni /
translated: It is the attainment of the vision of wisdom, for the sake of attaining the five eyes.

original: spyan de las mtshungs par ldan pa'i bdag nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: spyan de las mtshungs par ldan pa'i bdag nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because of the identity of the eyes and their concomitants.

original: zang zing dang mi 'jigs pa dang chos kyi sbyin pa gtong ba'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa'o zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zang zing dang mi 'jigs pa dang chos kyi sbyin pa gtong ba'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa'o zhes pa ni /
translated: It is the perfection of the six perfections, because of the giving of material things, fearlessness, and the Dharma.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs @110b pa rnams mthar son pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs @110b pa rnams mthar son pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the completion of the perfections of giving and so on.

original: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir sa bcu thob pa'o zhes pa ni /
analyzed: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir sa bcu thob pa'o zhes pa ni /
translated: He attains the ten stages because he has perfected the accumulations of merit and intuition and meditative concentration.

original: bsod nams la sogs pa rnams yongs su mthar byin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsod nams la sogs pa rnams yongs su mthar byin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he has perfected merit, etc.

original: chos gnyis dang bral ba'i phyir gnyis su med pa'i chos nyid ngo zhes pa ni gzung 'dzin gnyis su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos gnyis dang bral ba'i phyir gnyis su med pa'i chos nyid ngo zhes pa ni gzung 'dzin gnyis su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: He has the nondual reality because he is free from the two dharmas.

original: sgro btags ba med pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin dang gzhan ma yin pa'i chos nyid do zhes pa ni sgro 'dogs pa dang skur ba 'debs pa'i mtha' las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgro btags ba med pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin dang gzhan ma yin pa'i chos nyid do zhes pa ni sgro 'dogs pa dang skur ba 'debs pa'i mtha' las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
translated: He has the reality that is not other than the nature of thusness because he is free from superimposition.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes yongs su dag pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin nyid do zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes yongs su dag pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin nyid do zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: He has the nature of the limit of reality because he has the nature of the totally purified intuition of the Tathagata.

original: lta ba ngan pa'i tshang tshing brgya stong du ma ma lus par sel ba'i phyir rnam pa rnams cad mkhyen pa stong ba nyid kyi rang bzhin no zhes pa ni de de ltar ro //
analyzed: lta ba ngan pa'i tshang tshing brgya stong du ma ma lus par sel ba'i phyir rnam pa rnams cad mkhyen pa stong ba nyid kyi rang bzhin no zhes pa ni de de ltar ro //
translated: Since it completely eliminates the thickets of many hundreds of thousands of bad views, it is the knowledge of all aspects, the nature of emptiness.

original: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di ni 'di lta ste gnyis su med pa'i chos nyid kyi don gyi mtshan yang dag par 'dzin pa ston pa'i phyir chos thams cad brjod du med pa'i rang bzhin nyid do zhes pa ni /
analyzed: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di ni 'di lta ste gnyis su med pa'i chos nyid kyi don gyi mtshan yang dag par 'dzin pa ston pa'i phyir chos thams cad brjod du med pa'i rang bzhin nyid do zhes pa ni /
translated: This recitation of the name is like this: since it teaches the holding of the name of the meaning of the nondual reality, it is the nature of the inexpressibility of all phenomena.

original: de la chos gnyis su med pa ni stong ba nyid do //
analyzed: de la chos gnyis su med pa ni stong ba nyid do //
translated: Therein, the nonduality of phenomena is emptiness.

original: de la 'jug pa'i don du mtshan rnam par 'dzin pa de'i ston pa ste rgyur gyur ba nyid do //
analyzed: de la 'jug pa'i don du mtshan rnam par 'dzin pa de'i ston pa ste rgyur gyur ba nyid do //
translated: For the purpose of engaging with that, the holding of the name is its teacher, since it is the cause.

original: de ni 'khor lo gsum pa'i yon tan te /
analyzed: de ni 'khor lo gsum pa'i yon tan te /
translated: Those are the qualities of the third wheel.

original: de'i tshig rnams ni lnga bcu rtsa gnyis grangs so //
analyzed: de'i tshig rnams ni lnga bcu rtsa gnyis grangs so //
translated: Its words are fifty-two in number.

original: 'khor lo bzhi ba'i yon tan gyi dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'khor lo bzhi ba'i yon tan gyi dbang du byas nas gsungs pa /
translated: From the perspective of the qualities of the fourth wheel, it is said:

original: lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Vajrapāṇi, Vajradhara, and so on and so forth.

original: de la smad pa la sogs pa dang 'brel ba'i skye ba las bzlog pa de rigs te /
analyzed: de la smad pa la sogs pa dang 'brel ba'i skye ba las bzlog pa de rigs te /
translated: There, the opposite of birth connected with contempt and so on is reasonable.

original: rgyal rigs la sogs pa de rgyal bar byed cing brtan par byed bdag 'khor ba las brgal ba'i don gyis na bu ste /
analyzed: rgyal rigs la sogs pa de rgyal bar byed cing brtan par byed bdag 'khor ba las brgal ba'i don gyis na bu ste /
translated: Because it is the son who causes the victory and stability of that kṣatriya class and so on, and the meaning of crossing over saṃsāra, it is the son.

original: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo'o //
translated: It is the son of good lineage and the daughter of good lineage.

original: rigs kyi bu 'am / rigs kyi bu mo gsang sngags kyi sgo nas spyad pa spyod pa gang la las bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sku gnyis su med pa'i don dam
analyzed: rigs kyi bu 'am / rigs kyi bu mo gsang sngags kyi sgo nas spyad pa spyod pa gang la las bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sku gnyis su med pa'i don dam
translated: The Bhagavān Mañjuśrījñānasattva, the omniscient gnosis of all tathāgatas, the nondual ultimate body, is the son of good lineage and the daughter of good lineage.

original: pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa mtshan gyi gtsug gi nor bu 'di ni thams cad yongs su rdzogs dang / ma nyams shing lhag chad med pas tshigs su bcad pa'i tshig dang yig 'bru 'di dag nyid kyis zhes pa ni /🔽de la 'di ni gong du gsungs pa rnams kyis so //🔽@111a * // nyin gcig bzhin du ni nyi ma re re zhing ngo //🔽dus gsum du 'chang ba dang zhes pa ni gzhung dang don gyis so //
analyzed: pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa mtshan gyi gtsug gi nor bu 'di ni thams cad yongs su rdzogs dang / ma nyams shing lhag chad med pas tshigs su bcad pa'i tshig dang yig 'bru 'di dag nyid kyis zhes pa ni / de la 'di ni gong du gsungs pa rnams kyis so // @111a * // nyin gcig bzhin du ni nyi ma re re zhing ngo // dus gsum du 'chang ba dang zhes pa ni gzhung dang don gyis so //
translated: This is the crest-jewel of the names of the Praise in Hundred and Eight Names, which is complete in every way, and is not deficient or in excess.🔽By these very words and syllables of the verse,🔽this is what was said above.🔽Day after day means every day.🔽To hold it three times a day means by the text and the meaning.🔽

original: klog pa dang zhes pa ni glegs bam klog pa'o //🔽kun chub par byed pa dang zhes pa ni bsam pa'o //🔽tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang gzhan la yang zhes pa ni 'dul ba rnams la'o //🔽dam tshig ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa dang zhes pa ni dus ji lta ba bzhin du phyin ci ma log par bstan to zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: klog pa dang zhes pa ni glegs bam klog pa'o //🔽kun chub par byed pa dang zhes pa ni bsam pa'o //🔽tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang gzhan la yang zhes pa ni 'dul ba rnams la'o //🔽dam tshig ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa dang zhes pa ni dus ji lta ba bzhin du phyin ci ma log par bstan to zhes pa'i don to //
